item.title: Mapbox
item.description: Mapbox makes it easy to create a beautiful map for free using QGIS. Customize anything on your map with widgets, themes, and language packs. Introduction Mapbox How To Start Doh! Making a Simpsons-inspired map with expressions Exploring the edges of consumer-facing apps Mapbox helps power Snap Map Build beautiful experiences and drive engagement Traveling like a local: How Cool Cousin uses maps to personalize travel Locate Mapbox UNICEFâ€™s Magic Box Using Open Source by Red Hat and Uber and Big Data by Facebook to Map for Emergencies map viewer
